articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Combat Flight Contest among Commanding Officers of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Combat Flight Contest among Commanding Officers of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un guided the combat flight contest among commanding officers of the Korean People's Army Air and Anti-Air Force-2017.
					 The Supreme Leader came out to the airfield at 9 a.m.
					
					 Kim Kwang Hyok, commander of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force, in his opening speech said the contest was of significance in training all the flight commanding officers to be a-match-for-a-hundred fighters capable of destroying any targets including enemy aircraft carriers under the slogan "Forward after me!" when they received an order and further encouraging all the army to be combat-ready for national reunification. 
					
					 He expressed belief that all the flight commanding officers and pilots would display the militant spirit and invincible might of the Kim Jong Un's air force through the contest held on the 80th anniversary of the victorious battle of Pochonbo, and declared the contest open.
					
					 The respected supreme leader ordered the commanding officers and pilots to make sortie and went to the observation post to guide the contest.
					
					 The contest took place divided into a group of division or brigade commanders, group of commanders of pursuit fighter, bomber and raider regiments, group of commanders of light transport plane, helicopter and education aircraft regiments and group of young graduates of pilot-training institution.
					
					 The contest set takeoff, assault, zero-feet flight, wingover, intercept flight, free air-combat, landing, etc. as requisites for judgment. The ranking was decided according to points assessed with the help of various types of observation apparatuses.
					
					 Light aircrafts flew in the clear sky, flying the flags of the Workers' Party of Korea and the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and pursuit aircrafts made artistry flights.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was very pleased to say that fighter pilots successfully performed diverse artistry flights, their flights were wonderful and they fully showed scientific flying and perfect aviation. 
					
					 Following Kim Kwang Hyok, division or brigade commanders took off to perfectly carry out target-hitting, zero-feet flight, wingover and landing.
					
					 Regiment commanders and young pilots successfully carried out pair-takeoff, air attack, 30m-altitude flight, pair-wingover, free air combat flight, landing, etc.
					
					 Watching the fierce and hot contest, he said with great satisfaction that the contest was the best one among those held so far.
					
					 Artistry flights decorated the end of the contest.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the successful contest, the Supreme Leader gave important instructions to serve as a guideline for rounding off the combat preparation of the air force.
					
					 He met the young fighter pilots who displayed the militant spirit and bravery of young generation in the contest and warmly encouraged them. Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					 Service personnel of the KPA watched the contest.

articles.title: General Director of FM Meets Finland Lawmakers
articles.content:
General Director of FM Meets Finland Lawmakers
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Son Gyong, general director of the European Department 2 of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, on June 1 met and had a talk with Pekka Haavisto, member of the Parliament of Finland and president of the European Peace Institute, at the building of the Parliament of Finland. 
					 Kim Son Gyong informed the Finnish side of the DPRK's stand on the relations between the two countries. He stressed that the U.S. hostile policy and military threats to the DPRK should be removed, first of all, for the defusing of the tension on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Pekka Haavisto said that the European Peace Institute is making efforts to find out a way to contribute to defusing tension on the Korean peninsula and providing the atmosphere of dialogue. 
					
					 He expressed the will to make efforts to promote the exchange and cooperation between the European Peace Institute and the Korea-Europe Institute and develop the relations between Finland and other European countries and the DPRK.

articles.title: UNICEF Members Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
UNICEF Members Help Korean Farmers
 Sariwon, June 5 (KCNA)  -- Oyunsaikhan Dendevnorov, representative of the UNICEF here and his staff members gave helping hand to the Jongbang Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, on Monday. 
					 They helped farmers in weeding maize field.
					
					 They handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Party Information Workers Make Study Tour of Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site
articles.content:
Party Information Workers Make Study Tour of Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site
 Samjiyon, June 5 (KCNA) -- Party information workers' study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu made a study tour of the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site Monday.
					 They left Hyesan and arrived at Pochonbo. They laid bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing on the side of Karim stream and paid tribute to him. 
					
					  They looked round the Pochonbo Revolutionary Museum, police substation of the Japanese imperialists, the sub-county administrative office and the fire station. 
					
					 They went through the Spring Site in Poso-ri to enter Samjiyon County on the day.
					
					 In front of the statue of leader Kim Jong Il in Samjiyon County, they vowed to accomplish the great cause of Mt Paektu under the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They looked round Samthogong log cabin where he spent a night with members of the expedition group in June of Juche 45 (1956) when paving the way for the study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu. 
					
					 They toured the Samjiyon County Hall of Culture and the sports village.

articles.title: Revolutionary Drama "The Torch in Pochonbo"
articles.content:
Revolutionary Drama "The Torch in Pochonbo"
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- 80 years has passed since the victorious battle of Pochonbo commanded by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 The battle was a significant event which instilled into the Korean people the conviction that Korea was not dead but alive and they could emerge victorious if they fought against Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Many literary works with the battle as their main theme have been created in the DPRK.
					
					 Among them is revolutionary drama "The Torch in Pochonbo".
					
					 Early in May Juche 43 (1954), leader Kim Jong Il personally initiated the creation of the drama, wrote its script and gave energetic guidance to its creation on the occasion of the anniversary of the battle.
					
					 On the basis of a concrete plan of rehearsal, he gave detailed instructions to preparations, ranging from the whole course of drama to direction and stage properties.
					
					 The drama was successfully staged at the playground of the Pyongyang Primary School No. 4 on June 4, 1954.
					
					 Now, the drama serves as a banner and model masterpiece in creating revolutionary dramas.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Children's Camp Draws Endless Stream of Campers
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Children's Camp Draws Endless Stream of Campers
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- More than 18,000 schoolchildren of over 400 schools in Pyongyang have spent pleasant time at the Mangyongdae Children's Camp at the foot of picturesque Mt Ryongak in Pyongyang over the past one year since it was successfully remodeled and its first-term camping started.
					 At least 6,000 schoolchildren spent their camping this year.
					
					 Schoolchildren's camping is going on at the camp.

articles.title: Yonphungho Children's Camp Remodeled
articles.content:
Yonphungho Children's Camp Remodeled
 Kaechon, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Yonphungho Children's Camp was successfully remodeled by a unique architectural style to match the landscape of picturesque Lake Yonphung with due ceremony Monday.
					 The camp has the room for education in Kim Jong Il's patriotism, 20 odd bedrooms, a video-game room, lodging buildings, hall, playground, etc. to provide campers with all conditions.
					
					 Meanwhile, the first-term camping of schoolchildren started at the camp on the day.

articles.title: Mushroom Pills Helpful to Health Promotion Developed
articles.content:
Mushroom Pills Helpful to Health Promotion Developed
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Central Mushroom Institute under the Ministry of Agriculture in the DPRK has recently developed mushroom peptic pill and Hericium erinaceum nutritive pill, natural health foods.
					 The institute made the pills with medical mushrooms, which contain essential amino acids and physiological activators, as main raw materials and some Koryo medicines.
					
					 The pills are efficacious for such diseases as chronic gastritis, indigestion and gastritis hyperacid and have an effect of raising the resistance to diseases and relaxing fatigue and stress.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Heightened Vigilance against Imperialists' Peace Trumpeting
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Heightened Vigilance against Imperialists' Peace Trumpeting
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article that the global progressive peoples and countries aspiring independence should clearly see through the aggressive wild ambition of the imperialists behind their peace talk and cope with them with vigilance.
					 The article says that sudden war provocation behind peace signboard by taking the advantage of the slackness of the rival has been a stereotyped method used by the imperialists for aggression.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Now the Trump administration speaks in public about dialogue with the DPRK under preconditions.
					
					 The U.S. lets out incoherent talk about dialogue, but it has no intent to give up its hostile policy towards the DPRK and keeps whetting a sword of aggression.
					
					 But, we are always ready for any form of war to defend genuine peace.
					
					 The DPRK will further bolster up the national power of the great Paektusan nation in every way with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force until it beats the will of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces to unleash a war of aggression and have them roll back the hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 This is the mode of making revolution, the mettle of struggle and the peace-defending will of the army and people of the DPRK who have armed themselves with the idea of continuous revolution of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on S. Korean Conservatives' Confrontation Racket at NA Confirmation Hearing
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on S. Korean Conservatives' Confrontation Racket at NA Confirmation Hearing
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The puppet conservative group of south Korea, keen on escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, is trying to turn even the "National Assembly" confirmation hearing into a theatre for confrontation with the DPRK even though its mission is to discuss the capacities of the hopefuls for new "government" seats.
					 The "Liberal Korea Party" and other conservatives recently launched "coloring" offensive against those to stand at the confirmation hearing, citing "security verification". They urged the candidate for "prime minister" to "make clear his stand on the issue of improving human rights situation in the north" and asked him "if he agrees to the view that the north was behind the 'Choenan' sinking case", while blaming him for standing against the adoption of "resolution on improvement of human rights performance in the north" and approving an "amendment which deleted the north from the list of backstage manipulators of 'Choenan' case".
					
					 Even, So Chong Won, who had been ousted from the LKP, called for "verification of stand to the north" by the candidate for the director of the Intelligence Service and other candidates who appeared at the conformation hearing.
					
					 This hideous confrontation farce can be performed only by the conservative forces who pushed the north-south ties into the worst catastrophe as today.
					
					 What the south Koreans want is to immediately abolish all the evils left by the Park Geun Hye regime and to build a new society where the candlelight demonstrators have become key players.
					
					 The coteries of conservative group including the LKP, which committed all kinds of crimes, as cat's paws of traitor Park, against the desire and wish of the people, are the hotbed of traitorous policies and corruption and irregularities that should have been thrown overboard together with the top class criminal Park.
					
					 It is truly detestable to see the remnants of history, sternly punished by the public for their mad-cap confrontation racket, riding roughshod again to incite the north-south stand-off.
					
					 The dreary scene at the puppet National Assembly reminds one of the confirmation hearing during the Park Geun Hye regime in which those blowing louder trumpet for confrontation with the fellow countrymen could please the conservative group and earn posts of power.
					
					 At the confirmation hearing the conservative forces offered a pass to Han Min Gu who cried out for "punishing provocation base and even supporting and commanding forces" in case of "provocation" and Hong Yong Phyo who held that "north's nuke can not be tolerated" before others, putting forward them as a shock brigade in executing Park Geun Hye's confrontation policy.
					
					 The conservative forces' dirty inveterate nature and confrontational frenzy are to blame for the north-south relations which plunged into the worst stalemate today.
					
					 However, they are going reckless like a guilty party filing the suit first only to stun the public.
					
					 The conservative forces will get nothing but earlier final end, no matter how desperately they may stand against the "National Assembly" to avenge their ouster from power.
					
					 To side with the conservatives' confrontation racket while reading their faces would be little short of pricking one's eyes with one's own hands.
					
					 The south Koreans from all walks of life should ressolutely wipe out the remnants of Park Geun Hye challenging the candlelight demonstrators and open up a new chapter for national reconciliation and unity.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces Park Geun Hye and Her Stooges' Cynical Ploy to Hush up Thrice-cursed Crimes
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces Park Geun Hye and Her Stooges' Cynical Ploy to Hush up Thrice-cursed Crimes
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye and her stooges are making desperate efforts for hushing up their hideous crimes called "abuse of power".
					 The puppet conservative remnants were busy for removing all the documents of Chongwadae and barred all of data from presenting as evidence at the court. The defence council was prodded into overturning the prosecution indictment, describing it as "indictment by inference and imagination".
					
					 Meanwhile, Park does not hesitate to be extremely insolent as to be in the dock, changing her dresses as her habit of whore in the days of Chongwadae office. She made such arrogant reckless remarks as "I would speak later" to the court bench, looking round the court while grinning and yawning.
					
					 This behavior serves as the merciless challenge to the mind-set of the candlelight rallies and a foolish and ridiculous attempt to evade the punishment of history.
					
					 No desperation can help the Park Geun Hye clique dodge the merciless punishment, stern capital punishment of the south Korean people.
					
					 Such open attempt of the puppet conservative group including Hwang Kyo An at concealing evidence cannot evade more terrible punishment by adding deliberate and organized crimes of destruction of evidence to 18 high-profile crimes committed by her.
					
					 A lawyer made so preposterous and mean pleading that he refuted a testifier's statement by claiming what he said was upon other's presumption, meeting ridicule and criticism of the observers and media.
					
					 The Park's attitude at the courtroom is placing the conservative group in an unfavorable position as the south Korean CBS said that she made her not guilty senseless as she is dead to reason.
					
					 Moreover, the crimes committed by her were brought to light through irrefutable evidence and accomplices' testimonies and are being proved through the course of the trial.
					
					 The former concerned of the south Korean equitation circle was present at the court held on May 30 as a testifier.
					
					 He said that Choe Sun Sil won 70 billion won from Samsung Group and supported her daughter in riding drill while behaving herself as an emperor at the equitation circle and Park was behind.
					
					 His testimonies put the conservative group into utter confusion.
					
					 The traitor and her confidents will bring more trouble.
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye who is seeking a way to live and the "Liberal Korea Party" and other group of traitors should be buried to the last to remove the root cause of evils.

articles.title: Present S. Korean "Government" Urged Not to Follow in Footsteps of Conservatives: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Present S. Korean "Government" Urged Not to Follow in Footsteps of Conservatives: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The authorities of south Korea are now taking measures to revive the already defunct function of the "Human Rights Committee".
					 The south Korean public describes it as the "will to get rid of the inhuman attitude of the previous regime" and the "process for turning abnormality into normality".
					
					 This reflects the demand for the abolition of social evils getting stronger in the south Korean society after the ouster of the worst traitor Park Geun Hye.
					
					 In fact, the "Human Rights Committee" of south Korea resorted to all sorts of evil things as an anti-DPRK plot-breeding organization, away from its original mission.
					
					 The committee was set up in Nov. 2001 under the pretext of preventing the violation of "human rights" by power bodies in south Korea.
					
					 Article 4 of its "Human Rights Committee Law" stipulates that the "scope of application of the law is confined to south Korean nationals and foreigners residing within the south Korean territory".
					
					 But after the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye regimes, the committee had been reduced into an anti-DPRK confrontation body specializing in escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north to commit all sorts of evils.
					
					 Such criminal bodies like "special committee for human rights in the north" were set up within the committee and ultra-right conservative elements occupied key posts like chairman and permanent member.
					
					 Quite away from its original purpose, the committee had been keen on escalating confrontation with the north while calling for "human rights improvement plan" and "international seminar on human rights" in reference to the "human rights" in the north.
					
					 After all, members of the committee resigned en masse and the public complained that "human rights disappeared and human rights committee died" and "human rights should not be insulted".
					
					 At the instigation of traitor Park, the committee took the lead in carrying out the anti-DPRK smear campaign, revealing its confrontational nature.
					
					 Claiming "galvanized public concern for human rights issue in the north", the committee set up the "north's human rights records exhibition house" and collected data about "human rights violation" and put them on display. It even announced that it would offer such services as English translation for NGOs and individuals willing to submit data about "human rights situation in the north" to the UN bodies.
					
					 It justified anti-DPRK leaflet scattering-operation as an "expression of freedom" and did not hesitate to release "welcome statements" whenever the U.S. and its vassal forces fabricated "north's human rights resolutions".
					
					 The conservative forces reduced even the body dealing with their own human rights into anti-DPRK "human rights" body and confrontational body. This pushed the north-south relations into the worst phase and the situation on the peninsula close to a war.
					
					 South Korea has ample human rights issues, caused by the unpopular rule by the conservative forces, which have to be set right.
					
					 Citizens of the DPRK were abducted in group in broad daylight to be separated from their families against their will. Such crimes against humanity are openly committed in south Korea.
					
					 The "Human Rights Committee" has to disclose such serious human rights issues and make efforts to set them right.
					
					 This is the demand of the south Koreans and the way of reviving its function.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have to lend an ear to the assertion of the civic and public organizations, media and experts that the first human rights measure to be taken by the present "government" is to probe the truth behind "abduction of 12 women workers of the north" by the Park Geun Hye conservative forces and send them back to the north, and should not follow in the footsteps of the conservatives.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Disclose All Documents on Kwangju Bloodbath
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Disclose All Documents on Kwangju Bloodbath
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) --Members of the Kwangju City Assembly of south Korea demanded the U.S. open to the public all data that it masterminded and connived at the massacre of Kwangju citizens by the south Korean puppet army, according to Newsis of south Korea. 
					 They urged the present regime to demand the U.S. government open to the public all CIA documents on the Kwangju Popular Uprising.

articles.title: S. Korean Trade Unions Declare General Strike in Demand of Abolition of Part-time Jobs
articles.content:
S. Korean Trade Unions Declare General Strike in Demand of Abolition of Part-time Jobs
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean School Part-time Jobs Trade Unions and the Confederation of Trade Unions held a news conference in Seoul on June 1 at which they declared a general strike in demand of the complete abolition of the part-time jobs and pay hikes, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 They said that they would go on the strike at the end of June.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Police Reform
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Police Reform
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore carried an editorial calling for the puppet police reform on May 31.
					 The editorial said that the Ryongsan disaster in 2009 and the death of Paek Nam Gi who participated in the all-people struggle in 2015 were all tragic results of the police's excessive suppression.
					
					 The editorial underlined the need for the police to reflect on the past when it was at beck and call of the regime and reform itself to improve its human rights consciousness.

articles.title: Russian Body Hails Successful Test-fire of New Anti-Aircraft Guided Weapon System of DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Body Hails Successful Test-fire of New Anti-Aircraft Guided Weapon System of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK made public a statement on May 29 hailing the test-fire of the new anti-aircraft guided weapon system in the DPRK.
					 The statement extended congratulations to the supreme leadership, scientists and people of the DPRK over the successful test-fire of the new anti-aircraft guided weapon system.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The successful test-fires of weapons in the DPRK one after another are the fruition of the outstanding leadership of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The development and successful test-fire of the weapon system in the wake of bolstering up nuclear deterrence are of great significance as they refuted the enemy's theory of air superiority.
					
					 It is the display of the firm will of the supreme leadership of the DPRK to further bolster up its military capability for self-defence and powerful scientific and technical potentiality. 
					
					 The modern weapons of the DPRK will protect the country from the attack of the U.S.
					
					 We bitterly denounce the U.S. for introducing large nuclear aircraft carrier strike groups.
					
					 Just is the cause of the Korean people under the leadership of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We hope that the Korean people will achieve bigger success in the efforts to bolster up defence capability and protect peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Reminiscences of Kim Il Sung Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Reminiscences of Kim Il Sung Introduced in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted on its internet homepage the full text of the "2. Flames of Pochonbo (2)" of "Chapter 17 Korea Is Alive" Vol. 6 of Part 1 the Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, on June 1, on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the victorious Pochonbo battle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de pilotaje de combate
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de pilotaje de combate
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dirigio en el terreno la competencia de pilotaje de combate de los miembros de mando de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC-2017.
					A las 9 de la manana, el Maximo Dirigente llego al aeropuerto. 
					
					En su discurso de apertura, el coronel general de las fuerzas aereas Kim Kwang Hyok, comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, dijo que la competencia deviene el entrenamiento significativo que formara a todos los miembros de mando de aviacion como fenix capaz de aniquilar de un tiron a todos los blancos inclusive el portaaviones nuclear enemigo al despegarse en la delantera gritando la orden "!Sigueme!" si les da la orden y estimulara a todo el ejercito a la perfeccion de los preparativos de combate para la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Convencido de que a traves de la presente competencia que tiene lugar en el dia en que se cumple el aniversario 80 de la victoria en la Batalla de Pochonbo, todos los miembros de mando y los pilotos demostraran cabalmente el impetu combativo y el invencible poderio de la aviacion de Kim Jong Un, declaro el inicio de la competencia. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente dio la orden de salida a los participantes en la ocasion y subio al puesto de vigilancia donde dirigio la competencia. 
					
					La competencia se realizo dividida en 4 grupos; el de jefes de division y brigada, el de jefes de regimiento de cazas, bombarderos y asaltos, el de transportadores ligeros, helicopteros y aviones docentes y el de novatos recien graduados de los organos de formacion de pilotos. 
					
					El ranking se determino segun la clasificacion general evaluadas con varios aparatos de vigilancia tras definir como los elementos de evaluacion el despegue, el asalto, el vuelo a baja altura, la navegacion de interceptacion, la batalla libre aerea, el aterrizaje y otros pilotajes. 
					
					Con el inicio de la competencia, las avionetas con las banderas del Partido y del Comandante Supremo pasaron el cielo y los aviones de caza demostraron sus habilidades. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente se alegro mucho del mando cientifico y los excelentes pilotajes de los navegadores de combate, tras evaluar sus vuelos diestros.
					
					A continuacion de la presentacion del comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas, los jefes de division y de brigada realizaron la eliminacion de blancos de ataque, el vuelo a ras del aeropuerto, el aterrizaje y otras acciones de vuelo.
					
					Los jefes de brigada y los navegadores jovenes cumplieron excelentemente el despegue de dos aviones, el asalto, el vuelo a 30 metros de altura, la navegacion de batalla aerea libre, el despegue y otras.
					
					Mostrando la competencia renida de los participantes, se mostro gran satisfaccion diciendo que la competencia de hoy es mas excelente entre las pasadas.
					
					Terminada la competencia, se iniciaron vuelos de diestro.
					
					El Comandante Supremo volvio a mostrarse satisfaccion por haber realizado exitosamente la competencia y dio preciosas instrucciones que sirven de guia en el acabamiento de los preparativos del combate de las fuerzas aereas,
					
					Luego de reunirse a los aviadores jovenes participantes quienes demostraron el impetu combativo y valentia de los navegadores de batalla de nueva generacion, se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Los oficiales y soldados del EPC vieron la competencia.

articles.title: Director del MINREX se reune con parlamentario finlandes
articles.content:
Director del MINREX se reune con parlamentario finlandes
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ACNC) -- Kim Son Gyong, titular de la Direccion No. 2 de Europa del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio el dia primero en la sede del Parlamento de Finlandia con Pekka Haavisto, parlamentario y presidente del Instituto de Paz de Europa.  
					El diplomatico coreano informo la posicion de la RPDC sobre las relaciones entre los dos paises y subrayo que a fin de relajar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana hay que acabar primero con la politica hostil de Estados Unidos y su amenaza militar contra la RPDC.
					
					El parlamentario finlandes dijo que su instituto esta buscando el remedio para contribuir a la distension de la Peninsula Coreana y a la preparacion del ambiente de dialogo.
					
					Prosiguio que impulsara el intercambio y cooperacion entre el Instituto de Paz de Europa y el Instituto Corea-Europa y se esforzara por desarrollar las relaciones entre los paises europeos, incluyendo Finlandia, y la RPDC.

articles.title: Park Geun-hye y sus complices no evitaran pena capital: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Park Geun-hye y sus complices no evitaran pena capital: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ACNC) -- La traidora Park Geun-hye y sus inferiores estan desesperados para encubrir sus tremendos crimenes asociados con el escandalo de manipulacion chapucera de los "asuntos estatales".
					Los remanentes del campo de conservadores surcoreanos dieron de baja todos los documentos de Chongwadae para que no se presente al tribunal ni una prueba material.
					
					En la corte, instigan a los abogados sobornados a insistir en la "acusacion basada en la suposicion e imaginacion" para invalidar los datos de acusacion presentados por la fiscalia.
					
					Por otra parte, la traidora Park comparece en el banco de acusados en vestidos cada dia diferentes y dice al tribunal palabras descorteses. Para colmo, pasa revista a la audiencia con su mirada burlona y hasta bosteza.
					
					Esta actitud deviene un desafio frontal a la opinion publica reflejada en velas encendidas que no quiere perdonar a criminales principales y una tentativa ridicula para eludir la sentencia de la historia.
					
					Pero, la banda de Park Geun-hye no podra eludir la pena capital que le dictara la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					La escondida de las pruebas materiales de Hwang Kyo An y otros conservadores surcoreanos hace mas grave el delito de Park a quien se le imputan 18 cargos.
					
					La altaneria de Park en el tribunal complica mas la situacion de sus compinches como evalua la cadena surcoreana CBS.
					
					Los crimenes de ella se confirman en el juicio a traves de las pruebas irrefutables y declaraciones de sus complices.
					
					Un ex funcionario del sector de equitacion, quien tomo parte en calidad de testigo en el tribunal abierto el 30 de mayo, revelo que Choe Sun Sil quito del Grupo Samsung 70 mil millones de wones para el apoyo al entrenamiento de su hija y detras de este suceso, estuvo Park Geun-hye.
					
					Los residuos conservadores imponen mucho mas desgracias a las personas ensuciando el mundo.
					
					Todos los coreanos deberan eliminar la fuente del mal al liquidar a Park, el "Partido de Corea Libre" y otros traidores a la nacion que estan buscando la salvacion.

articles.title: ACNC comenta nueva farsa de confrontacion fratricida de conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta nueva farsa de confrontacion fratricida de conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ACNC) -- La horda conservadora del Sur de Corea escenifico la confrontacion fratricida en la audiencia del personal en la "Asamblea Nacional" en que se discute la calidad de los candidatos a cargos importantes de nuevo "poder".
					En los ultimos dias, el Partido de Corea Libre y otros compinches conservadores libran una ofensiva basada en la "teoria de colores" contra los candidatos a cargos importantes que comparecieron en la audiencia del personal bajo el pretexto de la "verificacion de la concepcion de seguridad".
					
					Al candidato al "premier" le obligaron a exponer "la posicion clara sobre la mejora de los derechos humanos del Norte de Corea" y consentir que "hay el Norte de Corea en el trasero del caso del hundimiento de la corbeta 'Cheonan'", recordando los hechos de que el nego la aprobacion de la  "resolucion sobre la mejora de DDHH del Norte de Corea" y declaro a favor del "proyecto de enmienda de la eliminacion del contenido de que "el Norte de Corea es el verdadero autor del incidente de la corbeta".
					
					Hasta So Chong Won, que habia expulsado del Partido de Corea Libre, insistio en la "verificacion de la concepcion sobre el Norte" del candidato al presidente del Servicio de Inteligencia y otros personales.
					
					Esto es otra farsa conflictiva que puede orquestar solo la banda conservadora titere que llevo a la fase tan catastrofica como hoy.
					
					Ahora, los habitantes surcoreanos desean la eliminacion urgente de todos los males del "poder" de Park Geun-hye y la construccion de nuevo mundo donde son duenos los habitantes que habian levantado las velas.
					
					El Partido de Corea Libre y otros compinches conservadores, fieles a la traidora Park Geun-hye, que cometieron los crimenes de toda indole navegando a contrapelo de la voluntad y demanda de los habitantes surcoreanos, son las fuerzas a ser sepultadas junto con Park.
					
					La audiencia de confirmacion escenificada esta vez en la "Asamblea Nacional" surcoreana hace imaginar la misma del tiempo de Park Geun-hye cuando a fin de tomar un importante cargo necesitaban mostrar la posicion de confrontacion fratricida adulando a los elementos conservadores.
					
					Por ejemplo, los conservadores habian dado aprobacion a Han Min Gu y Hong Yong Phyo, maniacos conflictivos, quienes en la audiencia juraron "atacar los focos de provocacion, las fuerzas de apoyo y hasta las de mando" y "no perdonar el arma nuclear del Norte de Corea", y los lanzaron como brigada de choque por la practica de la politica conflictiva de Park.
					
					Debido a la invariable naturaleza astuta y la furia conflictiva de la banda conservadora, las relaciones Norte-Sur se cayeron en el peor estado del fracaso como hoy.
					
					A pesar de esto, la horda conservadora surcoreana actua como el incendiario que grita "!fuego!", consternando a toda la sociedad surcoreana.
					
					Sus desesperaciones por satisfacer su rencor de haber expulsado del "poder" adelantaran solo el momento de su destruccion total.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben unirse con tales maniobras de la banda conservadora.
					
					Todos los habitantes surcoreanos deben eliminar a los remanentes de la banda de Park que desafian a la opinion popular, y escribir la nueva pagina de la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion.
